instruction_1.instruction: Change all references to 'Acme Corporation' to 'TechCorp Industries'

edits.original_text: This Employment Agreement (the 'Agreement') is entered into on January 1, 2026, between Acme Corporation ('Employer') and John Doe ('Employee').
edits.replacement_text: This Employment Agreement (the 'Agreement') is entered into on January 1, 2026, between TechCorp Industries ('Employer') and John Doe ('Employee').
edits.reasoning: Updated company name from Acme Corporation to TechCorp Industries

instruction_2.instruction: Change the annual salary from $120,000 to $150,000 and the bonus percentage from 15% to 20%

edits.original_text: The Employee shall receive an annual base salary of $120,000, payable in accordance with the Employer's standard payroll practices. The Employee shall be eligible for an annual performance bonus of up to 15% of base salary.
edits.replacement_text: The Employee shall receive an annual base salary of $150,000, payable in accordance with the Employer's standard payroll practices. The Employee shall be eligible for an annual performance bonus of up to 20% of base salary.
edits.reasoning: Updated annual salary from $120,000 to $150,000 and bonus percentage from 15% to 20%

instruction_3.instruction: Change the position from Senior Software Engineer to Principal Software Architect

edits.original_text: The Employee shall serve as Senior Software Engineer and shall perform such duties as are customarily associated with such position. The Employee shall report directly to the Chief Technology Officer.
edits.replacement_text: The Employee shall serve as Principal Software Architect and shall perform such duties as are customarily associated with such position. The Employee shall report directly to the Chief Technology Officer.
edits.reasoning: Updated job title from Senior Software Engineer to Principal Software Architect
